channel.title: A couple of little things
channel.description:
Just a couple of little things I spotted. First...
[img]https://s16.postimg.org/t9k0c891h/bm_c1a4b0000.jpg[/img] [img]https://s12.postimg.org/8l60e1mi5/bm_c1a4b0001.jpg[/img] The "6" goes away when you look at the door from a certain angle. (Blast Pit)
[img]https://s9.postimg.org/99qj53ffj/bm_c2a5b0095.jpg[/img] [img]https://s22.postimg.org/cpn1ua2mp/bm_c2a5b0088.jpg[/img] First image shows hole in the map, second image shows where it is. (Surface Tension)
I uploaded these images with an uploader site I found called postimage.org, which is actually a really nice uploader, but I'd never heard of it before, so a little unsponsored advertising.

item.title: A couple of little things
item.dc:creator: imadoofus
item.description:
Just a couple of little things I spotted. First…



The “6” goes away when you look at the door from a certain angle. (Blast Pit)



First image shows hole in the map, second image shows where it is. (Surface Tension)

I uploaded these images with an uploader site I found called postimage.org, which is actually a really nice uploader, but I’d never heard of it before, so a little unsponsored advertising.
